definition: ashamed and unable to show one's face
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
surname Rong
to hold/to contain/to allow/to tolerate/appearance/look/countenance

sentences.english: 'Don't embarrass your employee or make him feel small, ' says Mr. Das.
sentences.chinese: 達斯說，不要讓員工感到難堪，或讓他覺得無地自容。
她對他的嘲笑使他無地自容。

sentences.english: The disgrace bowed the family to the earth.
sentences.chinese: 不名譽的事使家庭羞愧得無地自容。

sentences.english: Temporary setbacks seem like colossal embarrassments and total failures.
sentences.chinese: 暫時的挫折就好像是徹底的失敗，尷尬得無地自容。

sentences.english: He has been cornered by his best friend.
sentences.chinese: 他最好的朋友卻讓他感到無地自容。

sentences.english: Confucius said quote is not all parents boon, me ashamed and embarrassed for.
sentences.chinese: 孔夫子說報不盡是父母恩，我無地自容而且爲之汗顏。

sentences.english: I told the counsellors that it was such a disgrace for this thing to happen on me.
sentences.chinese: 我向官方輔導員陳訴這件事情的發生真的是無地自容。

sentences.english: Say the truth and shame the devil.
sentences.chinese: 講真話就會使魔鬼無地自容。

sentences.english: She withered him with a scornful look.
sentences.chinese: 她“輕蔑”的一瞥使他無地自容。

definition: dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
to mend one's ways (idiom)/to turn over a new leaf
to boast shamelessly/to talk big
lit. to hate iron for not becoming steel/to feel resentful towards sb for failing to meet expectations and impatient to see improvement (idiom)
ashamed and resentful/indignant
overwhelmed by favor from superior (humble expr.)
traitor to one's love/heartless rat
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
lit. chickens flying and dogs jumping (idiom)/fig. in chaos/in disarray
to belittle/to scorn/to take sth lightly
spilt water is difficult to retrieve (idiom)/it's no use crying over spilt milk/what's done is done and can't be reversed/the damage is done/once divorced, there's no reuniting
to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)
pinyin: wei2 kong3 tian1 xia4 bu4 luan4

definition: lit. win an inch, want a foot (idiom); fig. not satisfied with small gains/give him an inch, and he'll want a mile
consigned to eternal damnation/with no hope of reprieve
to have no sense of shame/brazen
